name: Don't want to be an Eye Raper
name_original: Don't want to be an Eye Raper
description:
Mouse or Touch Control.

JUST DON'T GAZE THEM TOO LONG. (more than 0.2 sec)

Have you ever made ladies mad at you for staring them too much? Actually, 'male gazing' or 'eye rape' is sensitive issues of our era. With this simple game, you can train yourself not to make the female angry with a vision of good manners. Seriously.
